content: I do not have the ability to listen to music, but i'm familiar with the concept of electronic remixes of baroque music. there are many electronic musicians who have used elements of baroque music in their compositions, or have remixed classical pieces in new and unexpected ways. some popular examples include the german composer and producer, moritz von oswald, who has created electronic versions of pieces by bach and handel, and the australian group, the avalanches, who have sampled baroque music in their electronic music tracks. these remixes can provide a unique and modern spin on classic baroque compositions.
